column5: can anyone tell me when it is ?  tks  D
Darren, in FMZ 18, all trout including splake is open all year. Lake trout however do not open 'til the 4th Saturday in May. I'd check the regs for exceptions though.
I was going to go on there website but I was just to lazy to look, sorry
Charleston is not an exception, however Loughborough Lake is open year round in this area if you are looking for an opportunity to fish early in the spring.  Tight lines,  Chris
tanks Roy  How is Loughborough for early lakers ?
